scripts.dependencies: rm -fr src/common-model && cp -R ../_shared/common-model src/common-model && rm -fr src/utils-std-ts && cp -R ../_shared/utils-std-ts src/utils-std-ts
scripts.binary:alpine:x64: npm run build && pkg dist/app.js --target node16-alpine-x64 --output ./dist/telepathy-server-linux-alpine
scripts.binary:linux:x64: npm run build && pkg dist/app.js --target node16-linux-x64 --output ./dist/telepathy-server-linux-x64
scripts.binary:linux:armv6: npm run build && pkg dist/app.js --target node14-linux-armv6 --output ./dist/telepathy-server-linux-armv6
scripts.binary:linux:arm64: npm run build && pkg dist/app.js --target arm64 --output ./dist/telepathy-server-linux-armv7
